title: 10 Minute Yoga For Beginners ( EASY Morning Stretches )
description:
This 10 Minute yoga for beginners routine offers easy morning stretches for back pain relief.
Yoga is a great addition to your morning routine to help stretch the body and stiffness away.
Stretching the back in the mornings is important for overall health and will truly help you feel physically free throughout the day.
This 10 minute morning yoga is beginner friendly and created for general back pain. 
If injury is present be sure to ask your dr if these stretches for back pain are safe for you.
This Morning yoga class can be done in bed or on the mat!
Join me this morning for this beginners 10 minute yoga for back pain routine.

#MorningYoga #10MinuteYoga #Yoga

comments: Get $20 off one of my favourite activewear brands at http://rwrd.io/8v1aaao 🐆

Finally !! Someone who actually understands the limits of beginners, even stiff as a board old fogeys like me ! :-)  I looked through some of your other routines as well and found many that seem perfect for me. Thank you !! Subscribed,
Finally !! Someone who actually understands the limits of beginners.

I work early mornings unloading groceries and this is the perfect way to start my day and get myself up & out of bed at 4 am. :) i’ve used this every morning for about a week or so. thank you so much for a routine that can be done in bed & centers the back!

My body is so ridiculously tight!  I decided to take a small step in the right direction by doing a short stretch routine morning and night.  Sticking to it..well, that will be another thing.  So this morning I took you out into my bathwater temp backyard, laid out a blanket, and followed along with you while watching white puffy clouds in the beautiful blue sky, listening to hummingbirds humming away in the flowers, Finches chirping away in the trees, and getting an occasional kiss from one of my pups.  Not only did you give me a stretch routine I CAN DO, but you made me want to do MORE!  Taking time to do your routine outside also made the beginning of my morning so peaceful and beautiful. Thank you Bird for understanding that not all of us are limber and for doing stretches a true beginner can do and feel good about!  Namaste.  😌
